overview: On 22nd May 2021 the festival presented a special five-hour livestream concert direct from Worthy Farm, headlined by Glastonbury mainstays Coldplay.  Setlist:  1. Higher Power  2. The Scientist  3. Viva la Vida  4. Human Heart (with KING)  5. Clocks  6. Fix You  7. A Sky Full of Stars
title: Coldplay: Live at Glastonbury 2021
